title: 04/01/21 DPS Hour 2 Mick Cronin
itunes:title: 04/01/21 DPS Hour 2 Mick Cronin
description:
Mick Cronin tells Dan that I he is truly lucky to share this time with his father. Mick says that we got hot from the 3 point line and we have gotten better defensively. And he reacts to the retirement of Hall of Fame coach Roy Williams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
